:點樣可以保養隻HOT TOYS


: 以下轉自網上


不要被太陽長時間直射


合金長時間在太陽下爆曬，高溫會導致顏色變淺，表面油漆可能會起泡及龜烈，嚴重影響figures的外觀。要留意，就算放到飾櫃但長時間用射燈照視，都可能會導致上述問題。


避免在雙手不乾淨時觸碰


手上的汗水與油份很容易黏在合金表面，久而久之就會氧化成一層白白的薄膜，所以接觸figures前最好先將雙手清潔乾淨。


留意溫度及濕度


香港天氣潮濕，所以要十分留意家中的濕度，因為太潮濕會引致生銹;至於溫度方面，太大的溫差會導致熱漲冷縮，令hot toys變得脆弱。所以將空間保持乾爽對保存hot Toys很重要。


放入玻璃櫃display , 得閒用除塵帚 掃幾下


IM電池保養方法：


im果d版電仔唔好長時間放係本體入面

玩完 着完燈 j完好拎哂d電出黎

因為d版電仔放係本體入面耐左會發漲

最後會爆漿 會損壞im d電路

【Avengers: Endgame - Cosbaby Bobble-Head】

With massive super heroes team-up in Avengers: Endgame, the fourth and the final installment of Marvel Studios production has shattered box office records internationally. Today, Hot Toys is excited to present a new wave of Cosbaby based on characters from Avengers: Endgame. Each Cosbaby Bobble-Head is standing approximately 8.5 – 14cm tall with bobble-head function.

The latest wave features Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Nano Lightning Refocuser Version) and Iron Spider (Instant Kill Mode Version) both equipped with magnetic and LED light-up function; Iron Man Mark LXXXV & Rescue, Nano Gauntlet (Iron Man Version), Nano Gauntlet (Hulk Version) and Iron Patriot with LED light up function; Tony Stark with Iron Man helmet, Tony Stark and Morgan Stark, Doctor Strange with Portals each comes with a character backdrop inspired by movie scenes; whereas Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Battling Version) includes a graphic accessory; and Thor with luminous reflective effect.

Moreover, Hot Toys team has also spend great effort in recreating the remarkable scenes with adorable Cosbaby featuring Captain America VS Captain America, Iron Man Mark LXXXV & Rescue (Unmasked Version) Cosbaby (S) Bobble-Head Collectible Set; and Thanos with Nano Gauntlet, Captain America (Battling Version) Cosbaby (S) and Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Shield Version) Bobble-Head.

In addition, a specially designed Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Landing Version) Cosbaby (S) Bobble-Head brings fans not only Iron Man in classic landing pose with mask crafted with fine metallic painting, but also a Marvel mini light box to enhance the whole collectible experience!

Hot Toys is excited to release a brand new Neon Tech Iron Man 1.0 Cosbaby inspired by neon culture to celebrate the release of our 600th Cosbaby! Designed with luminous reflective element, both of the packaging and Cosbaby collectible are going to be eye striking under the shine of specialized LED light. Also, fans who purchased this Cosbaby Collectible will receive a certificate card imprinted with serial number.

Both of the Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Landing Version) Cosbaby (S) Bobble-Head and Neon Tech Iron Man 1.0 Cosbaby (S) Bobble-Head are only available in selected markets!

Recreate the ultimate showdown between the Avengers and Thanos with our latest Avengers: Endgame Cosbaby collection now!

#HotToys #Cosbaby #Marvel #MarvelStudios #Avengers #Endgame

【Hot Toys購物專區 搶先現貨發售 MARVEL 電影道具1:1比例珍藏品、《復仇者聯盟4: 終局之戰》及蜘蛛俠電影和電玩 COSBABY 新品】

Hot Toys將連續16年假香港動漫電玩節舉行大型珍藏人偶展覽！今年，展位陣容將如上年般準備了28個展覽攤位 (約2700平方尺)，將延續MARVEL狂熱，強勢集結本年度最具人氣與熱話的最新珍藏人偶作品全力策動 ─ 「Hot Toys 大型珍藏人偶展覽」，將重點地展出在全球引起熱潮的《復仇者聯盟4: 終局之戰》和最新上映的《蜘蛛俠：決戰千里》、人氣電玩《Marvel’s Spider-Man》和手遊格鬥遊戲《MARVEL：超級爭霸戰》的MARVEL展區、跨越時代的科幻經典連外傳電影的STAR WARS展區、傳奇經典代表作《蝙蝠俠: 黑夜之神》、《小丑回魂2》和電視劇集《閃電俠》的DC 展區和購物專區，將率先展示Hot Toys一系列1:1、1:4、1:6比例珍藏人偶、載具珍藏品及COSBABY迷你珍藏人偶新品，勢必令Hot Toys展位成為所有參觀者必到的朝聖之地！

除了精彩的展品外，Hot Toys更特設購物專區將搶先販售4款會場首發品，包括: 《鐵甲奇俠3》鐵甲奇俠裝甲格納庫迷你珍藏品 (一套七款及單裝版本)、《復仇者聯盟4: 終局之戰》鐵甲奇俠Mark LXXXV 反應爐1:1比例珍藏品和Marvel 隊長傳呼機1:1比例珍藏品，以及《蜘蛛俠：強勢回歸》蜘蛛無人機1:1比例珍藏品，定必讓一眾Hot Toys擁躉歡喜若狂！更驚喜是Hot Toys 預備了超過130款人氣COSBABY 迷你珍藏人偶與電影精品新品供粉絲們搶購，當中必買之選包括: Iron Man Mark LXXXV (Landing Version) COSBABY (S) & Marvel 迷你燈箱、香港限定的Neon Tech Iron Man 1.0 COSBABY (S) [附獨立編號卡]、Tony Stark and Morgan Stark COSBABY (S)、Tony Stark and Iron Man Helmet COSBABY (S)、Spider-Man COSBABY (L)、全套《蜘蛛俠：跳入蜘蛛宇宙》 COSBABY (S)、《蜘蛛俠：決戰千里》燈箱、各款蜘蛛俠COSBABY造型咕𠱸、《蜘蛛俠：跳入蜘蛛宇宙》燈箱，以及《鐵甲奇俠》、《美國隊長2》和《復仇者聯盟》珍藏人偶迷你包裝磁石等等，尚有更多COSBABY電影精品即場發售，勢必引發動漫迷絡繹不絕的搶購人潮! 週末有時間就來參觀選購啦！

Toy Hunters及 Secret Base 會員更可尊享購物禮遇:
• 95 折購買 Hot Toys COSBABY 迷你珍藏人偶系列
